Nico Calabria Was Born Without A Right Leg And Hip, But He Plays Football, Has Wrestled And Did Gymnastics Too

Nico Calabria Was Born Without A Right Leg And Hip, But He Plays Football, Has Wrestled And Did Gymnastics Too

If you were born without a right hip or leg, well, sports and adventure would hardly be a part of your life, or at least that would be the general perception. But for Nico Calabria, this handicap has only strived him to do better and excel at whatever he has tried out his hand at.

Men

Nico plays football and even wrestled in his high school. Not to mention he was a gymnast too. At the age of 13 he raised USD 100,000 in charity by climbing Mount Kilimanjaro. That is something most able-bodied people would not do.

Men's Fitness

Once for his football team in high school, he scored a goal on crutches that was so amazing that it got over 2 million hits on YouTube. Nico started playing football when he was just 5 years old. While he knows he can never play as an able-bodied person, well, it has not stopped him from taking part in the beautiful game.

Don't Miss 4.1 K SHARES 181 SHARES 645 SHARES

How does he fight his disability? It's his attitude. He chose not to let his handicap limit him and that's what has kept pushing him forward. He is still moving on ahead. His motivational speeches have inspired many around the world.

Nico did not let his handicap prevent him from chasing his dream. So what's your excuse especially if you have the use of all your limbs? He tried and succeeded. The rest of us can at least try.
